title: Suggest some clubs
content: I'm in second year CSE in RR. I haven't joined any clubs yet, which clubs should I join for a better profile w.r.t job or for studying abroad??

comments.body:
>better profile w.r.t job or for studying abroad??

No club will help you directly get a job or improve your chances for MS admission. Clubs help you indirectly by helping you network with similar-minded people and provide you with a platform to develop your soft skills. Taking part in club events will also expose you to various niches, which may or may not benefit you - depends on whether you *individually* pursue those niches. Just attending events and being in a club adds zero value because no company or admission board will be impressed by seeing "X club, PES University" on your resume.
hmmm ok...which technical club is good?
What is your interest? based on that, u can join a club
so basically i was bio student till 12th so idk shit ....i'm yet to figure out my interests
Ok, figure it out and join whichever club you like
yo u know u could have atleast listed some functioning technical clubs man, u just started stringing him out lmao
